message: I think it's fair to start with a 90/10 split, considering the inflation advantage I have this round. Let's see if you agree!
Your turn Alice.  How about we split things a bit more evenly this time?  Remember, the clock is ticking on those dollars.
I'm willing to split things more evenly now, but I'm not going to give away more than 40% to you. Let's find a compromise.
